Articles.Content: Hello eveybody. This is Cryova. I found Kerbal Space Program through the Steam post about the Asteroid Day Mod thingy. I tried the demo an found this to be the game of my dreams. Now I have the full version and have been struggling to even reach orbit but hey, it is rocket science! Half the fun are the explosions!

I don't know if I'd go half. Maybe 40% [35% unintentional], but that's just me. 

Be sure to pack extra snacks, as well as Delta-V. Both have their uses in space! Mostly Delta-V, but the snacks are good to.Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
Enjoy yourself. When I was a noob it took me 10-20 tries (can't remember) just to get to orbit. Have fun, and welcome to the forums and such.
